title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.2 - Approval of new devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.2 - Approval of new devices

State Regulations

Special safety equipment or new devices to be used on
elevator installations, not contemplated by this Part, may be used when
approved by the Department of Labor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
